title: [Self-Directed] Interactive Flexible Instructional Design and Training Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile device proficiency and general understanding of social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Learners are office workers (administrative/managerial) studying in a limited technological environment based on smartphones. Their application skills are verified through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three training execution strategies tailored to learner characteristics using flexible instructional methods.
Learners can design one or more instructional plans that respond to real-time learner reactions by applying interaction-based learning techniques.
Learners can complete a project that solves social domain job-related problems using microlearning content optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
